name: doubleclick-image-downloader
title: Double-click Image Downloader
description: Double-click any image to download it quickly and quietly.
author: Faziri/Marnes <marnick.leau@gmail.com>

preferences.name: targetFolder
preferences.title: Custom Downloads folder
preferences.description: Write a valid path here. Leave blank to use the default Downloads folder.

preferences.name: requireShift
preferences.title: Require Shift key to be pressed

preferences.name: disableLinks
preferences.title: Link/image hybrid workaround
preferences.description: Alt-double-click on a hybrid image/link to ignore the link and download the image without navigating away.

preferences.name: excludedDomains
preferences.title: Domain exclusion list
preferences.description: Domains to exclude, separated by a comma. Example: www.startpage.com,www.google.co.uk,store.steampowered.com.

preferences.name: fileNamePattern
preferences.title: Filename pattern
preferences.description: Variables: %counter% = a counter value, %original% = the original filename, %title% = the tab's title. Example: dblclick-%title%-%counter% -> dblclick-Example Gallery-1

preferences.name: resetCounterOnRestart
preferences.title: Reset the filename counter when closing/restarting Firefox.
preferences.description: Disabling/enabling this extension will also cause a reset if this option is enabled!

preferences.name: enableSubfolder
preferences.title: Create subfolders
preferences.description: Downloaded images will be saved into this/these subfolder(s).

preferences.name: folderNamePattern
preferences.title: Subfolder name pattern
preferences.description: Variables: %domain% = the domain of the current page (not the image's source domain!), %title% = the tab's title. Example: dblclick-%domain% -> dblclick-imgur.com
